remediation: Upgrade grumpydictator/firefly-iii to version 6.1.1 or higher.
title: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements in Output Used by a Downstream Component ('Injection')

vulnDescription.Overview: grumpydictator/firefly-iii is a personal finances manager. Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Improper Neutralization of Special Elements in Output Used by a Downstream Component ('Injection') via the webhooks feature. An attacker can inject malicious HTML content by submitting specially crafted input.
